sentence.Network_en: Unresolved or unacknowledged fears can trigger sleepwalking.
sentence.Network_cn: 残留在心里的或不为人知的恐惧都可能引发梦游。

sentence.Network_en: Doctors say that sleepwalking is much more commonthan is generally supposed.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生说,梦游症比人们通常认为的要常见得多.

sentence.Network_en: She told him she hurt her foot while sleepwalking!
sentence.Network_cn: 她说自己是在梦游的时候把脚弄伤的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 梦游，原版周公解梦大全，免费周公解梦破解 ... （sleepwalking） 梦游与梦话 （sleepwalking） 梦游症 （sleeptalking） 分类：释梦 …
...道政民异常的原因而在家中装了CCTV，知道了是因为梦游病(Sleepwalking)的关系所以道英和尹汉为了治愈政民而继续住在一起， …
睡行症(sleepwalking)是以开始于慢波睡眠而引起在睡眠中行走的一系列复杂行为基本特征的睡眠障碍。睡行症的发病率在普通人群中 …

list.abs: sleepwalker eyes open , people are clearly mistaken , and can answer some simple questions or order .梦游者眼睛张开，让人误以为是清醒的，而且可以回答一些简单问题或命令。
Some sleepwalkers talk in their sleep loudly enough ,, 有些梦游者睡着里大声说话,

they oversaw the finishing touches on the cartoons that had been in mid-production when the blow came and one imagines them sleepwalking through the studio like people in shock .他们监督收尾的漫画已在中期生产时，打击来了，想象他们梦游通过演播室人民一样感到震惊。
She told him she hurt her foot while sleepwalking !, 她说自己是在梦游的时候把脚弄伤的.

entry.def: If someone is sleepwalking, they are walking around while they are asleep.

example.ex: He once sleepwalked to the middle of the road outside his home at 1 a.m.
example.tran: 有一次，他在凌晨1点钟梦游走到了家门外的马路中央。

means.word_mean: 1. walking by a person who is asleep

auth_sentence.content: Have been sleepwalking through life, future reader.
auth_sentence.res_content: Have been sleepwalking through life, future reader.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Have been sleepwalking through life, future reader.

auth_sentence.content: I think London is sleepwalking towards Johannesburg.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think London is sleepwalking towards Johannesburg.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think London is sleepwalking towards Johannesburg.

auth_sentence.content: We are sleepwalking into a nightmare world where drones are omnipresent.
